{T}, Reappropriate: Add {W} or {B}. [i](Exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i] [i](To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Vacation homes near the wilderness were among the first buildings to be abandoned by the wealthy and harvested by the rest.[/i]
